title: Is adc just going to be a bunch of runaans 100% crit marksmen with 20% dmg directed to a bleed?
body: I feel like this is where it's going...i main adc so idc really and i only play kalista so i've ALREADY been doing most of this...but they wanted itemization to not be static and I don't see the ability to itemize situationally at all, i feel this core is going to be necessary on everyone and adcs will be more broken than they were in season 4
